property.name: fs.dremioS3.impl
property.description: The FileSystem implementation. Must be set to com.dremio.plugins.s3.store.S3FileSystem

property.name: fs.s3a.endpoint
property.description: Endpoint can either be an IP or a hostname, where Minio server is running . However the endpoint value cannot contain the http(s) prefix. E.g. 175.1.2.3:9000 is a valid endpoint.

property.name: fs.s3a.path.style.access
property.description: Value has to be set to true.

property.name: dremio.s3.compat
property.description: Value has to be set to true.

property.name: fs.s3a.connection.ssl.enabled
property.description: Value can either be true or false, set to true to use SSL with a secure Minio server.
